title: Content Element (Structure)
description: A content element, ie some form of (possibly nested) markup

subtype.description: The subtype of the element, which is context-dependent

atts.description: An object containing USFM attributes or subtype-specific additional information (such as the number of a verse or chapter). The value may be a boolean, a string or an array of strings

target.description: The id of the sequence containing graft content

preview_text.description: An optional field to provide some kind of printable label for a graft

new.description: If present and true, is interpreted as a request for the server to create a new graft

content.description: Nested content within the content element

meta_content.description: Non-Scripture content related to the content element, such as checking data or related resources
